stimulusHtml: Figure 1 shows a uniform magnetic field directed toward the bottom of the page and Figure 2 shows a uniform magnetic field directed toward the top of the page. A small magnetic compass is also shown. The shaded end of the compass needle is a north magnetic pole. Which of the following correctly describes the orientation of the compass when the compass is moved into each magnetic field?
choicesHtml: In Figure 1, the shaded end the compass needle will point toward the top of the page and in Figure 2 the shaded end of the compass needle will point toward the bottom of the page.
In Figure 1, the shaded end of the compass needle will point toward the bottom of the page and in Figure 2 the shaded end the compass needle will point toward the top of the page.
In Figure 1, the shaded end of the compass needle will point to the right and in Figure 2 the shaded end of the compass needle will point to the left.
In Figure 1, the shaded end of the compass needle will point to the left and in Figure 2 the shaded end of the compass needle will point to the right.
